All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AboutActivity
This activity displays information about the Quizo application, including its version, and provides links to external resources or credits.
Admin
Represents an administrator entity in the Quizo application, used for authentication and management.
AdminActivity
This is the main activity for administrators in the Quizo application, serving as a central hub for various administrative functionalities.
AdminDao
This interface handles the data access object (DAO) for admin-related operations, specifically for managing Admin entities.
AdminDatabase
Abstract Room database class for managing administrator data in the Quizo application.
AdminDatabaseClient
A singleton client class for accessing the AdminDatabase instance throughout the Quizo application.
AdminEditPassword
This activity allows administrators to change their password within the Quizo application.
AdminLogin
This activity handles the login process for administrators in the Quizo application.
AdminRegister
This activity facilitates the registration of new administrators for the Quizo application.
AlertBox
This utility class provides a standardized way to display custom alert dialogs within the Quizo application.
Attempt
Represents a single quiz attempt by a user in the Quizo application.
ComputerQuizActivity
This activity facilitates the Computer Science quiz for users in the Quizo application.
Constants
A utility class containing constant values used throughout the Quizo application.
Credits
A utility class providing methods related to application credits, specifically for generating random links to asset creators.
DateParser
A utility class for parsing and formatting date and time values within the Quizo application.
EditPasswordActivity
This activity allows regular users to change their password within the Quizo application.
FinalResultActivity
This activity displays the final results of a quiz attempt to the user in the Quizo application.
GeographyQuizActivity
This activity facilitates the Geography quiz for users in the Quizo application.
HashAlgo
A utility class for hashing passwords using the SHA-256 algorithm.
HistoryActivity
This activity allows users to view their quiz progress and past attempts in the Quizo application.
HistoryAdapter
This adapter is responsible for displaying a list of quiz attempts (history) in a RecyclerView within the Quizo application.
HistoryAdapter.AttemptViewHolder
A ViewHolder describes an item view and metadata about its place within the RecyclerView.
Keyboard
A utility class for managing the soft keyboard (on-screen keyboard) in Android applications.
LeaderBoard
`LeaderBoard` is a data class that represents a single entry in the quiz leaderboard.
LeaderBoardActivity
This activity displays the leaderboard for the Quizo application, showing users' total scores.
LeaderBoardAdapter
`LeaderBoardAdapter` is a custom RecyclerView.Adapter used to display a list of LeaderBoard entries in a RecyclerView.
LeaderBoardAdapter.LeaderboardViewHolder
ViewHolder class for the LeaderBoardAdapter.
LiteratureQuizActivity
This activity facilitates the Literature quiz for users in the Quizo application.
LoginActivity
This activity handles the login process for regular users in the Quizo application.
ManageQuestion
This activity provides administrators with the functionality to manage quiz questions within the Quizo application.
MathQuizActivity
This activity facilitates the Mathematics quiz for users in the Quizo application.
NetworkListener
A BroadcastReceiver that listens for network connectivity changes and notifies registered listeners.
NetworkListener.NetworkChangeListener
Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when network connectivity changes.
Question
Represents a quiz question entity in the Quizo application.
QuestionActivity
This activity allows administrators to add quiz questions within the Quizo application.
QuestionDao
This interface handles the data access object (DAO) for question-related operations, focusing on managing Question entities.
QuestionDatabase
Abstract Room database class for managing quiz question data in the Quizo application.
QuestionDatabaseClient
A singleton client class for accessing the QuestionDatabase instance throughout the Quizo application.
QuizOptionActivity
This activity presents users with various quiz topics in the Quizo application, allowing them to select a subject to begin a quiz.
QuizoVibrator
A utility class for providing haptic feedback (vibration) on the device within the Quizo application.
R
 
R.color
 
R.drawable
 
R.id
 
R.layout
 
R.string
 
R.style
 
R.xml
 
RegisterActivity
This activity facilitates the registration of new users for the Quizo application.
RuleActivity
This activity displays the rules of the Quizo application to users, likely in a paginated format using a ViewPager.
RulesViewPagerAdapter
This adapter is responsible for populating a ViewPager with individual rule pages for the Quizo application.
SharedPref
A singleton utility class for managing data persistence using Android's SharedPreferences.
SplashActivity
The `SplashActivity` class serves as the initial entry point for the application, displaying a splash screen for a short duration.
User
Represents a regular user entity in the Quizo application.
UserActivity
This is the main activity for regular users in the Quizo application, serving as a central hub for accessing various quiz-related features and user settings.
UserDao
This interface handles the data access object (DAO) for user-related operations, including managing User and Attempt data.
UserDatabase
Abstract Room database class for managing user and quiz attempt data in the Quizo application.
UserDatabaseClient
A singleton client class for accessing the UserDatabase instance throughout the Quizo application.
UserWithAttempts
A data class that represents a User along with their associated quiz Attempt.
WebActivity
This activity is designed to display web content within the Quizo application using a WebView.
